data.title: The Arthur Conan Doyle Encyclopedia
data.text:
Sir Michael Caine CBE (born 14 march 1933 as Maurice Joseph Micklewhite) is a British actor an producer who played Reginald Kincaid, aka Sherlock Holmes, in 1998 in the movie Without a Clue with Ben Kingsley as Dr. Watson.

In 2018, he gave his voice to Lord Redbrick in the animation movie Sherlock Gnomes.

Cinema

1988 : Without a Clue (as Reginald Kincaid / Sherlock Holmes)

2018 : Sherlock Gnomes (as the voice of Lord Redbrick)
